review:
Subject: Positive Recommendation for Dr. Shiva Shankar Roy.



Hi Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to express my gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise you provided during my recent wisdom tooth extraction. Despite my initial concerns about the pain, your skillful approach and the prescribed pain management plan made the recovery surprisingly smooth.I was particularly impressed by the swift reduction in pain within the first 24 hours, and I found the prescribed Tramadol to be effective. In fact, I only needed one dose as the pain diminished significantly.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the results of the surgery and appreciate your professionalism throughout the entire process. I believe others could benefit from your expertise, and I would like to recommend you to anyone in need of dental care.

Thank you once again for your excellent service.üôè



Best regards, Sanjay Kumar Prasad!
reply_text: Thank you so much for such a lovely words

review: .I was avoiding going to a dentist for a long long time due to previous unpleasant experiences.** *** ** ** *********** ******* very pleasing personality and a gem of a person. Dr Roy is truly on top line of dental professionals. He made me feel relaxed and calm throughout the process without any pain and I truly appreciate his sueperb workmanship. My pain and suffering is all over ..all thnks to the doctor..He is caring, compassionate , and patient with a desire to make his patients happy.I am so relieved and happy with treatment..if you have a dental issue, meet Dr Roy. review: I have had the experience of several dental procedures and majorly Dental Implants for full mouth rehabilitation under Dr Shiv Shankar Roy. I have had an impeccable smooth and seamless dental treatment experience. Dr Shiv Shankar has demonstrated genuine passion, proficiency, and utmost care throughout the process. He is very approachable open to all queries and available for follow-up through the treatment. He ensures that the patient has the utmost care and comfort level. I have been associated with him as my dentist for the entire family for a long period and it has always been a welcoming and professional ambiance with desired outcomes. I would highly recommend him for his exceptional services and patient care for all people with dental issues to give him a visit without hesitation to get that perfect smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend Shiv Shankar Roy for dental implants. His expertise, along with his polite and humble behaviour , creates a positive and comfortable environment for patients. I recently had a dental implant, and his skill during the surgery was exceptional. He treats patients with kindness and care, making the entire experience smooth and reassuring. I am grateful for his excellent work and professionalism.
